name: Mortal Kombat
description: PREPARE YOURSELF...The #1 arcade hit is here: from Sub-Zero, Rayden and your favorite Kombat Warriors to the grueling endurance and intense mirror matches! Execute bone-shattering combos and ferocious finishing moves! Defeat the half-human dragon Goro, and destroy the shape-changing Shang Tsung to become the Supreme Mortal Kombat Warrior!
